_header: If thou wilt this work begin
Title(s): On the Virtue of the Planets and of the Philosopher’s Stone
_description:
Geber, On the Virtue of the Planets and of the Philosopher’s Stone — eighteen lines [Singer (1928)
XSinger, Dorothea Waley. Catalogue of Latin and Vernacular Alchemical Manuscripts. 3 vols. Brussels: Lamertin, 1928-31, 792]

BLHar2407.First Lines: Ȝyfe þow wolt thys werke begynneþan schreuy the clene of alle thy seyne…
BLHar2407.Last Lines: …of thy deseyre þow mayst not mysseand alle so of heuen þat sweȝt blese
BLHar2407.Editions:
Ashmole,  Elias. 
             Theatrum Chemicum Britannicum.
         London: J. Grimond, 1652: 272.
